item.title: Build DR ready .NET Web APIs on AWS
item.description: Introduction Disaster Recovery (DR) is an essential aspect of cloud computing. A solid DR strategy is required to ensure business continuity and less downtime in the event of unexpected disruptions. AWS, with its global infrastructure, provides the flexibility and scalability needed for effective DR. Multi-AZ (Availability Zone) deployments provide DR capability at the AZ level. [â€¦] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/build-dr-ready-net-web-apis-on-aws/
